title: Barn Dance
description: (Alternate cover edition of ASIN B09Q2CFDBS) After months of furtive assignations, Ashâ€™s lover leaves him for a life of riches and respectability. Heartsore, angered by his rejection, Ash has no one to confide in.  Neighboring farmers Seth and Dougal accidentally discover his secret. They know Ash has been taken advantage of and take him in hand, hoping to teach him what real love is.  Can Seth and Dougal help Ash mend his broken heart?
author: Jules Radcliffe
